hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT accounts.Referenc AS id, accounts.Account AS number, accounts.Code_Currency AS currencyId, accounts.Type_Account AS accType, accounts.Open_Date AS OpenDate, accounts.FNCash AS FNCash, case when accounts.Open_Close not like '%З%' then 0 else (case when accounts.UserTypeAccount like '%Я%' OR accounts.UserTypeAccount like '%Т%' then 3 end) end AS accountState FROM depositr_dbt AS accounts, depcontr_dbt AS contract WHERE accounts.Account = :accountNumber AND accounts.CodClient = :clientId AND contract.ContractID = accounts.MainContractID

SELECT accounts.Referenc AS id, accounts.Account AS number, accounts.Code_Currency AS currencyId, accounts.Type_Account AS accType, accounts.Open_Date AS OpenDate, accounts.FNCash AS FNCash, case when accounts.Open_Close not like '%З%' then 0 else (case when accounts.UserTypeAccount like '%Я%' OR accounts.UserTypeAccount like '%Т%' then 3 end) end AS accountState FROM depositr_dbt AS accounts, depcontr_dbt AS contract WHERE accounts.Referenc = :accountId AND contract.ContractID = accounts.MainContractID

SELECT accounts.Referenc AS id, accounts.Account AS number, accounts.Code_Currency AS currencyId, accounts.Type_Account AS accType, accounts.Open_Date AS OpenDate, accounts.FNCash AS FNCash, case when accounts.Open_Close not like '%З%' then 0 else (case when accounts.UserTypeAccount like '%Я%' OR accounts.UserTypeAccount like '%Т%' then 3 end) end AS accountState FROM depositr_dbt AS accounts WHERE accounts.Account = :accountNumber

SELECT owned.Referenc AS id, owned.Account AS number, owned.Code_Currency AS currencyId, owned.Type_Account AS accType, owned.Open_Date AS OpenDate, owned.FNCash AS FNCash, case when owned.Open_Close not like '%З%' then 0 else (case when owned.UserTypeAccount like '%Я%' OR owned.UserTypeAccount like '%Т%' then 3 end) end AS accountState
FROM depositr_dbt AS owned ,depcontr_dbt AS contract WHERE owned.CodClient = :clientId And owned.Open_Close = '' And SUBSTRING (owned.Account, 0, 5) in ('40817','40820','42301','42601') And (owned.Action = 0 OR owned.Action = 1) And LOCATE('Я', owned.UserTypeAccount) = 0 And LOCATE('Т', owned.UserTypeAccount) = 0 And LOCATE('К', owned.UserTypeAccount) = 0 And contract.ContractID = owned.MainContractID UNION SELECT deposited.Referenc AS id, deposited.Account AS number, deposited.Code_Currency AS currencyId, deposited.Type_Account AS accType, deposited.Open_Date AS OpenDate, deposited.FNCash AS FNCash, case when deposited.Open_Close not like '%З%' then 0 else (case when deposited.UserTypeAccount like '%Я%' OR deposited.UserTypeAccount like '%Т%' then 3 end) end AS accountState
FROM depositr_dbt AS deposited, sbtrast_dbt AS sbtrast ,depcontr_dbt AS contract WHERE sbtrast.CodClient = :clientId AND sbtrast.ReferenceKind = 0 and deposited.Referenc = sbtrast.Referenc AND deposited.Open_Close = '' And SUBSTRING (deposited.Account, 0, 5) in ('40817','40820','42301','42601') AND (deposited.Action = 0 OR deposited.Action = 1) AND (sbtrast.Action = 0 OR sbtrast.Action = 1) And LOCATE('Т', deposited.UserTypeAccount) = 0 And LOCATE('Я', deposited.UserTypeAccount) = 0 And LOCATE('К', deposited.UserTypeAccount) = 0 AND contract.ContractID = deposited.MainContractID UNION SELECT deposited.Referenc AS id, deposited.Account AS number, deposited.Code_Currency AS currencyId, deposited.Type_Account AS accType, deposited.Open_Date AS OpenDate, deposited.FNCash AS FNCash, case when deposited.Open_Close not like '%З%' then 0 else (case when deposited.UserTypeAccount like '%Я%' OR deposited.UserTypeAccount like '%Т%' then 3 end) end AS accountState
FROM depositr_dbt AS deposited, sbtrast_dbt AS sbtrast ,depcontr_dbt AS contract WHERE sbtrast.CodClient = :clientId AND sbtrast.ReferenceKind = 1 and deposited.MainContractID = sbtrast.Referenc AND deposited.Open_Close = '' And SUBSTRING (deposited.Account, 0, 5) in ('40817','40820','42301','42601') AND (deposited.Action = 0 OR deposited.Action = 1) AND (sbtrast.Action = 0 OR sbtrast.Action = 1) And LOCATE('Т', deposited.UserTypeAccount) = 0 And LOCATE('Я', deposited.UserTypeAccount) = 0 And LOCATE('К', deposited.UserTypeAccount) = 0 AND contract.ContractID = deposited.MainContractID
SELECT TOP 1 owned.CodClient AS CodClient FROM depositr_dbt AS owned WHERE owned.Referenc = :accountId
